item.title: Possible Reference...
item.content:encoded: The item is probably referencing the "T-Virus" from the popular Resident Evil video games. They also had a "G-Virus", but I'm only guessing it is the T-Virus over the G-Virus since the "Z" part sounds more like a "T" sound over a "G" sound. Secondly the T-Virus to my knowledge was first introduced in "Resident Evil" (not RE2, RE3 etcâ€¦).
